page.title: 03FAMILY LIFE
page.content: OUR FAMILY GETS UP AT ABOUT SEVEN THIRTY.WE CLEAN OURSELVES UP,AND THEN HAVE SOME BREAKFAST CONSISTING OF BACON,EGGS,FRIED BREAD,AND SOMETIMES CEREALS.MY MUM STAYS HOME AND DOES THE HOUSEWORK.MY DAD IS A FARMER,SO HE HAS BREAKFAST AND THEN GOES TO WORK.MY BROTHERS ARE ALSO FARMERS AND GO TO WORK.THEY GET TO THE FARM BY CAR.THEY HAVE A SORT OF PICNIC,AT DINNER TIME CONSISTING OF SANDWICHES,CAKE AND A DRINK.THEN THEY COME HOME FOR TEA AND WE HAVE A COOKED MEAL(MEAT VEGETABLES,AND A DRINK).IGO TO SCHOOL FROM NINE O'CLOCK TILL FOUR O'CLOCK.IF I HAVE ANY HOMEWORK I DO THAT AND THEN GO OUT WITH MY FRIENDS .COME IN AROUND NINE O'CLOCK,THEN SOMETIMES HAVE CEREALS,AND GET MY EQUIPMENT FOR SCHOOL,AROUND TEN O'CLOCK I GO TO BED.
